title: where are featured game modes in custom matches????
body: I used to love playing URF in a custom game and be able to 1v1 my bro in a URF match, but right now we can't? is it just a bug please riot fix this...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any schedule for featured game modes in custom matches. I know they randomly show up, but I don't believe you're experiencing a bug since I don't have URF as an option in custom matches either.

You can find any official announcements regarding game modes in the [**News**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) section of the site. Let me know if you have any other questions.

sorry for the late response, have been gone on vacation but still playing league of course ;). So my question is will we ever get to play custom games with the featured game modes then? or is that just too hard to implement and not happen?
